triples.name: Retrieval-augmented generation
triples.relevance: RAG is the foundational technique that GraphRAG extends to handle global, corpus-level questions.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: LLMs are used to build the graph index and generate responses in the GraphRAG approach.

triples.name: Automatic summarization
triples.relevance: Query-focused summarization is the core task that GraphRAG addresses for global questions.

triples.name: Knowledge graph
triples.relevance: Knowledge graphs are the core data structure used to organize and represent entities and relationships in GraphRAG.

triples.name: Knowledge extraction
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel knowledge extraction and community summarization approach for building graph indices that enables question answering over private text corpora.
